data.title: Aster Fields, Sun City Hilton Head, SC Homes for Sale
data.meta_description: Easy, hassle free access & daily updates of all Aster Fields Sun City Hilton Head Homes For Sale. Look Now!
data.text:
Gearing up to buy or sell a home soon in Sun City Hilton Head? Call Group DiNenna at 843-781-6700. Your neighborhood Aster Fields, Sun City Hilton Head realty team is here to help navigate the Sun City Hilton Head real estate market.

Aster Fields, Sun City Hilton Head, Real Estate Market

Homes for sale in Aster Fields, Sun City Hilton Head are primarily single-family detached homes that range in style and size. Aster Fields homes for sale can be found falling between 1,500 and 3,000 square feet in size and offer many desirable upgrades and designer finishes. Many of the homes have decent-sized lots and attached garages.

Aster Fields homes for sale generally have two to four bedrooms and two to four bathrooms. The prices of homes are based on age, condition, and location. The homes are priced between mid to upper $200K and mid to upper $500K.

Aster Fields, Sun City Hilton Head, Community Amenities

Aster Field, Sun City Hilton Head is the ideal location for those who enjoy spending time outdoors. This community home to many lagoons, lakes, trails, paths, and more which can be easily enjoyed by strolling, jogging or biking throughout the neighborhood.

Homeowners of Aster Fields have many opportunities to keep active. Some of the activities that are available to them are tennis, bocce ball, and golf. Grab a neighbor and head out in the great outdoors.

55+ Communities in the Area

Located in the Okatie area of Beaufort and Jasper counties in the Lowcountry region of South Carolina are many additional 55+ communities. A few of these communities include:

Argent III: Argent III is a lovely and welcoming neighborhood in Sun City Hilton Head. The community has an array of activities for residents to participate in so they live a healthy and active lifestyle. In a spacious neighborhood, residents enjoy plenty of recreation opportunities both within and surrounding the area.

Basket Walk: Basket Walk is an active adult gated community that is located in Sun City Hilton Head. This mature community enjoys resort-style amenities that provide homeowners with a lavish lifestyle. Basket Walk residents are in an ideal location as they are a short distance from beautiful Hilton Head Island.

Spring Hill: Spring Hill is a quaint neighborhood, located in Sun City Hilton Head, that has quiet streets and beautiful views of the lagoon. Settle into the home of your dreams and a lifestyle that exceeds all expectations.

Hampton Village: Hampton Village is a neighborhood in Sun City Hilton Head. Quality crafted homes, ideal location, and beautiful natural surroundings make Hampton Village a must-see neighborhood for any prospective buyer.

Whispering Oaks: Located in the Northern part of Sun City Hilton Head is the neighborhood of Whispering Oaks. Whispering Oaks is a beautiful community found just a short distance from downtown Sun City Hilton Head. Quality crafted homes, ideal location, and beautiful natural surroundings making Whispering Oaks a must-see neighborhood for any prospective buyer.
